skill_constraints: Key-person dependency on Lead Developer for P/Invoke and fo-dicom.
resource_bottlenecks: Lead Developer is the sole resource for critical, high-complexity tasks.
mitigation_strategies: Frontend Developer is severely underutilized, creating major inefficiency.

resource_bottlenecks: Lead developer dependency is reduced through knowledge sharing.
mitigation_strategies: Allocate frontend.dev's buffer (16h/sprint) to pair programming on backend integration tests and simple API tasks. Allocate lead.dev buffer to pair with backend.dev on fo-dicom consumer logic.
